As Software Engineer III, you’ll work with Lytx's industry-leading Safety Application Software, which handles extensive amounts of video and data collected from over 600,000 vehicles worldwide! Perform other duties as assigned

BS in Computer Science/Engineering or equivalent experience.
Enterprise software engineer experience with 5+ years’ building scalable web applications, preferably in .NET C#.
Proven understanding of object-oriented design practices and patterns.
Strong Full stack developer experience with focus on the back end and knowledgeable with modern front-end frameworks. (Angular, ReactJS, etc.)
Design and development experience with APIs such as RESTful and microservices architecture.
Experience with cloud systems such as AWS, GCP or Azure.
Database engineering knowledge (SQL and/or NoSQL).
Experience with any of following will be an advantage: Typescript, JavaScript, Kafka, Docker, Kubernetes, RabbitMQ, MQTT, Redis and AWS.
Expertise with building testable systems using Unit Testing and TDD methodologies.
Ability to collaborate across numerous teams and build new strategies to achieve results.
Agile software development experience.
Passion for teamwork and mentoring junior developers
